name: Nerds 4 Hire
tag_list: computer-repair, laptop-repair, lcd-repair, tablet-repair, virus-removal, virus, iphone-screen-repair, ipad-screen-repair, ipod-screen-repair, iphone-screen, ipad-screen, ipod-screen, iphone4, iphone4s, iphone5, cracked-iphone, cracked-ipad, cracked-ipod,
overview:
Computer, and Mobile Device Repair/Services since 1999. Nerds 4 Hire inc. provides repair service, support, and sales for Apple/Mac, and Windows computers, smartphones and Tablets in the Greater Toronto Area, with Global remote services.

We fix iphones, and tablets too!! Mobile device repair includes iPhones, iPods, iPads, and other devices, just give us a call.

Located in the town of Markham, with onsite services provided to the Greater Toronto Area (GTA), Unionville, Richmondhill, Thornhill, Whitchurch Stouffville, Pickering, Kitchener/Waterloo, and other locales.

Remote PC service is available for clients located in cities outside of our onsite area, and in other countries.

We provide a variety of technical services, here are a few. -Virus and malware removal -Data recovery, data transfer -Email setup -Networking -Laptop service -LCD repair -Hardware troubleshooting -Software install/setup/instruction …and more please call or visit our website for more information, or to request a quotation. Student and Senior rates available.
